parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the specified resource. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the resources from which you want to remove tags.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   **acl**: an access control list (ACL)
*   **loadbalancer**: an Application Load Balancer (ALB) instance
*   **securitypolicy**: a security policy
*   **servergroup**: a server group

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that you want to remove.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The keys of the tags that you want to remove.
